about.name: Salary Calculation
about.description: Professional tools for calculating take-home pay, tax liabilities, benefits valuation, and compensation analysis

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, we use official 2025 tax brackets and rates from government sources. While accurate for estimates, consult a tax professional for your specific situation.
We support tax calculations for 15+ countries including USA, UK, Canada, Australia, Germany, France, India, and many more.

mainEntity.name: Are your calculators free to use?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, completely free. No sign-up, no hidden fees, no premium features. All calculations are done instantly in your browser.

mainEntity.name: Do you include benefits and equity in calculations?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, our calculators can include health insurance, retirement contributions, bonuses, equity/RSUs, and other compensation components.
